price: Ṣé ẹ fọkànbalẹ̀ sí Ẹni tí Ó wà ní (òkè) sánmọ̀ pé kò lè jẹ́ kí ilẹ̀ gbe yín mì? Nígbà náà, ilẹ̀ yó sì máa mì tìtì.
arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: a-amintum man fī al-samāi an yakhsifa bikumu al-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūru
